targets.query: SELECT last("AC Power Solar") FROM "PV" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT last("Consumption") FROM "PV" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) ORDER BY time ASC
SELECT last("Power from grid") FROM "PV" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT last("AC Power Battery")*-1 FROM "PV" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT last("Power to grid") FROM "PV" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT last("AC Power Wallbox") FROM "PV" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT last("out_temp") FROM "Weather" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("Bad Temperatur") as Bad, mean("Büro Temperatur") as "Büro", mean("Helena Temperatur") as Helena, mean("Robert Temperatur") as Robert, mean("Küche Temperatur") as "Küche", mean("Schlafen Temperatur") as Schlafzimmer, mean("Stube Temperatur") as Wohnzimmer FROM "Tado" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("abluft") as Abluft, mean("aussenluft") as Aussenluft, mean("fortluft") as Fortluft, mean("zuluft") as Zuluft FROM "autogen"."Helios" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT round(mean("hot_water_current")) as Warmwasser, mean("solar_collector_temp") as Kollektor FROM "ViCare" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
